Dear Sheffield City Council,
I hope you can help me with the below questions.
1. How many of the council’s Looked After Children under the age of 16 are currently living in unregulated accommodation?
To clarify – unregulated accommodation refers to any property a Looked After Child is living at which isn’t registered by Ofsted. These can include but not limited to boats, caravans, tents, air bnb’s, booking.com properties, hotels, residential homes awaiting Ofsted registration and properties owned by the council.
2. What was your total spend (staffing costs plus property costs) to home your looked after children under the age of 16 in this type of accommodation for the year 1st April 2024 to 31st march 2025
Yours faithfully,
Ms Mulcare

Dear Sarah Louise Mulcare,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Unregulated
placements which we received on 07/05/2025.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 05/06/2025. Please do not hesitate to contact
